html:
In 1850, a severe storm hit Scotland stripping large knoll known as "Skara Brae”

Underneath was a Neolithic village with 10 houses complete with stone hearths, beds, cupboards and flushing toilets 

This village was occupied from 3180 BC to about 2500 BC  1/🧵 

📸 Wknight94 https://t.co/IUS1B5QT1O
